page.title: 13WRINGTON PARISH COUNCILLOR
page.content: IN AN INTERVIEW A PARISH COUNCILLOR GAVE THIS INFORMATION. WRINGTON'S POPULATION IS ABOUT 2,000. THE PARISH COUNCIL HAS 13 MEMBERS, 9 FOR THE SW AND 4 FOR THE NE SIDES. AT THE MOMENT 4 HOUSING ESTATES ARE BEING BUILT; WHEN FINISHED 100 NEW HOMES WILL HAVE BEEN COMPLETED. THESE HOUSES ARE BEING BUILT TO KEEP PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE, AND ARE CHEAP ONES FOR FIRST TIME BUYERS. THE MAIN EMPLOYMENT IN THE VILLAGE IS AT THE NEARBY "COUNTRY KITCHENS" MUSH- ROOM FARM. THERE ARE SEVERAL INDUSTRIAL ENTERPRISES IN WRINGTON, SUCH AS BUILDERS' MERCHANTS. THERE IS PLENTY FOR YOUNG PEOPLE TO DO: A YOUTH CLUB WITH POOL AND TABLE TENNIS. FOR O.A.P.'S THERE IS A FRIENDLY CLUB WHICH HOLDS EVENTS LIKE COFFEE MORNINGS.
